name: Jacob N.
content:
Jacob came out and repaired my phone where I was. Which was great. YAY!

Super nice guy and would recommend him to anyone!

name: Shaon R.
content:
Awesome guys: Jacob and Devin

These guys came out on short notice. Called on the morning on black Friday and they answered and actually waited 30 mins at the located for us to finish shopping at MCAS Miramar. They were very polite and professional.  Thank you for all you guys did for us. IPhone repair san diego

name: Valerie J.
content:
Jacob came to my office and replaced my iphone screen in 15 minutes.
He did a good job and was pleasant and professional.

name: Kelly K.
content: I would give them 10 stars if I could.  They replaced my screen and LCD on my iPad.  I had an initial glitch with the repair but Devin bent over backwards to make it right and to do it quickly.   Very honest, professional and fast service.  I can't recommend them highly enough.

name: Keung P.
content: Great service! Devin and Jacob were both very nice and helpful! I recommend this service to everyone! Fixed the broken iPhone in less than 10 minutes!

name: Kevin Z.
content: Awesome dudes. Punctual, speedy, and my phone looks as good as new. I was so glad to learn there's an alternative to going to the Apple store. This was so much better than dealing with mall parking!

name: Kristin S.
content: These guys were great! Very professional and honest! Came out today and replaced two iPad screens in less than an hour. Got a discount for two. Hopefully won't need then again but will call on them again if I do.

name: Patch M.
content: Absolutely amazing service! :) Jacob did an amazing job on fixing our ipads and iphone. Jacob and Omar is very friendly and very polite. Will definitely recommend them to all my friends. And will definitely call them when I need to have my gadgets fix. Thanks guys!

name: Christina G.
content: Another great job! I will continue to use them for my iphone mishaps. Thanks Jacob! (for some reason I thought your name was Jesus from the last time I used your services...my bad)

name: chi v.
content: Omg thank you so much Jacob . He saved my life .. I thought my phone completely broke can't turn on and can't get any calls or text . I called around on New Year and nobody open or pick up phone . So I found him on Yelp and he did pick up phone and show me to restart the phone without have to pay money .. Save $100 .. I'm so happy . Will call Jacob in the future when I need anything . Trust this company

name: Sarah I.
content: Convenient and quick!! In all my years of iPhones, I cracked my screen for the first time :(. I used the help of Yelp to find a mobile iPhone repair and this one had the best reviews and A LOT of them! He came the same day I text him, he came to my job to repair my screen, incredibly nice guy and all was done in about 20 minutes. Awesome service!

name: Erik P.
content: Very professional, personable- came back to fine tune a iPhone 6- very efficient way to handle this common problem- I can see why this is the top rated i pad repair service in SD

name: Allen S.
content: Great service that took about five minutes on a table in my apartment. The final product looks great and my phone looks brand new. Service was really friendly and quick and i would recommend it to anyone who want a quick fix for a broken screen. They come to you! Also they have the cheapest price i could find for an iphone 6 screen repair.

name: Jaime F.
content: They had a quick response and were honest and upfront about the best way to fix my screen. 5 stars - totally recommend!!!
